FAQ / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Hiding Spot

  1. After seeing which of my characters gets stealth, can my opponent change which of their characters is attacking? [Source: WotC]
    No. Hiding Spot isnâ€™t revealed until after your opponent locks in their choice for attacker.
  2. What happens if someone has Brave and Stealth at the same time, like if I played Hiding Spot on Blitzwing while he was in tank mode, do they cancel out, does the newer stays take effect? [Source: WotC]
    They cancel each other out. An attacker is not able to fulfill both conditions, therefore the attacking player can choose a defender as normal.
